caption: The image is a purple poster with a cartoon illustration of two children sitting on a book. The poster is advertising a Wednesday reading event, where all students are required to bring reading books. The poster is from the @reallygreatsite Instagram account.
original_title: Purple and Black Illustration Class Announcement Instagram Post
texts: Every Wednesday, all students are required to bring reading books
